title: Sri Lanka construction expands in August 2025: PMI
byline: A growth in road development and water supply work in the month contributed to the increase in the New Orders sub index.

title: Sri Lanka sees thin foreign selling in rupee bonds after five-week buying
byline: Sri Lanka has witnessed over USD 46 million inflows in the previous 5 weeks

title: Sri Lanka average coconut prices rise 6.8-pct, more nuts offered
byline: The average price for 1,000 nuts was 138,581.96 rupees on October 2.
